Name: Brunete Nascimento Chagas
Description:
Brunete was beaten to death with a stick.

> [deadname] Nascimento Chagas, 22, was murdered at about 6 pm on Sunday (6), at Rua de Janeiro, near the Paulo Cícero passage, in União neighborhood, Marituba >
>
> [Brunete] had a large head wound and a stick was found nearby. Sergeant Fernandes and Private Frank could not get more information because of the "law of silence", which keeps people who fear retaliation from criminals. "Nobody will say anything here," said the sergeant.

Name: Natascha Peixoto de Lima
Description:
Natascha was shot by two men on a motorcycle in front of a motel.

> A [trans woman] was shot dead last night in front of a motel in the Zero KM region of Várzea Grande. According to information from the Military Police, two suspects on a motorcycle were talking to [deadname] Peixoto de Lima, known as "Natascha", 27, when the victim's colleagues heard the shooting. Arriving at the scene, they found the victim already dead. 

TvT partner organization Grupo Gay da Bahia & VG news 11.10.2013

Name: S. Athiswaran
Description:
The victim was found tied to a chair with multiple stab wounds in her abdomen.

> BUTTERWORTH: A [trans woman] was murdered in [her] rented low-cost flat at Taman Pantai Bersih in Bagan Ajam here.
>
> The body of S. Athiswaran, 31, was covered with blood and [her] hands and legs were tied with a string. [Her] face was also covered with plastic.
>
> Penang CID deputy chief Asst Comm Mohd Nasir Salleh said police rushed to the scene after receiving a call from the public at about 9am yesterday and found the flat  door unlocked. The victim’s body was found on the floor in a bedroom and there were multiple stab wounds on the victim’s abdomen.

TvT project: The Star Online  14.10.2013

Name: R. M.
Description:
R.'s body was found in a pasture. She had been strangled.

> The body of a [trans woman] was found around 7:30 am on Tuesday (15), in the rural area of ??Ibiporã (16 km from Londrina). She was found in the middle of a pasture and showed signs of strangulation.
>
> According to the Military Police, the owner of a site near Clube dos Dez, on the road that goes to Sertanópolis (37 km from Londrina), was found the corpse. The Civil Police already had information about a possible murder since Monday (14).
>
> The [victim] was undocumented and had not been identified as of 9:15 am on Tuesday. The body was sent to the Forensic Medical Institute (IML) of Londrina, where it will undergo examination to detect the real cause of death.
>
> The [trans woman] is believed to have been killed elsewhere, possibly around 24 hours earlier, and her body dumped in the pasture.

TvT partner organization Grupo Gay da Bahia & Catve TV  15.10.2013

https://web.archive.org/web/20131118025631/http://londrina.odiario.com:80/policia/noticia/778111/corpo-de-travesti-e-encontrado-em-pasto-da-zona-rural/

Name: W. Marques de Souza
Description:
The victim's body was found near a church at a site frequented by sex workers. She had been stabbed 8 times.

> An as yet unidentified [trans woman] was found dead late Friday afternoon by the caretaker of a site belonging to an Evangelical Church, located near Avenida Grande Circular, East Zone of Manaus.
>
> The body had a large knife blow to the jugular vein and was found in a wooded area, which according to investigators at the Specialized Homicide and Kidnapping Police Station (Dhes) just off the grounds of a church, is known to be a hot spot. encounter between [trans women] and their clients.
>
> "We believe she tried to fight the perpetrator, as she also had cuts to her hands," said one investigator who declined to be named.
>
> The victim appeared to be between 28 and 30 years old. Professionals of the Civil Police forensics believe that the interval between the time of death and the finding of the body was eight hours. Police found a small portion of alleged cocaine and $110I ibside the bra worn by the [trans woman], which may be evidence that the victim was performing beyond sexual program the sale of narcotics.

TvT partner organization Grupo Gay da Bahia & O Globo  19.10.2013 & A Critica 24.10.2013

Name: Name Unknown
Description:
The victim was shot by a man on a motorcycle. She died at the scene.

> At dawn on Wednesday (23), a homicide crime occurred near the Aristophanes Fernandes Exhibition Park in the municipality of Parnamirim. A [trans woman] was shot dead in the middle of the public road.
>
> According to information coming to the report of the RN News Portal via telephone, a man on a Bros type motorcycle approached the [trans woman] and fired several shots at the victim. The shots were accurate and the [victim] fell to the dead ground.
>
> Military Police were called in and made several attempts to capture the suspect, but were unsuccessful. The victim's body was removed by the Police Technical and Scientific Institute for investigation and forensics.
